bibl.title: Reconsidering the Place of Papyrus Bodmer XIV-XV (P75) in the Textual Criticism of the New Testament.
bibl.note: P. Bodmer XIV-XV (= van Haelst 406; LDAB 2895). - 1. The original publication of P75 and subsequent discussions of its date. - 2. Reassessing the paleographic range for the hand of P75. - 3. The context and codicology of P75. - 4. The binding and continued use of P75. - 5. The text of P75 and the text of Codex Vaticanus. - 6. Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Brent Nongbri, Reconsidering the Place of Papyrus Bodmer XIV-XV (P75) in the Textual Criticism of the New Testament.

P. Bodmer XIV-XV (= van Haelst 406; LDAB 2895). - 1. The original publication of P75 and subsequent discussions of its date. - 2. Reassessing the paleographic range for the hand of P75. - 3. The context and codicology of P75. - 4. The binding and continued use of P75. - 5. The text of P75 and the text of Codex Vaticanus. - 6. Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
